articles.author: Sam Brookes
articles.title: Aston Villa: 437-goal star would be 'statement signing' at Villa Park - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Aston Villa are interested in signing Atletico Madrid striker Luis Suarez this summer. The forward is out of contract at Atletico at the end of the season.
articles.content:
Aston Villa signing Atletico Madrid forward Luis Suarez would be a statement of intent, according to journalist Pete O’Rourke.
